plot: We were all children once and we have fallen in love with a girl for the first time, everything is wonderful until you are separated by distance.
title: Si tu supieras
plot_es: We were all children once and we have fallen in love with a girl for the first time, everything is wonderful until you are separated by distance.
plot_en: We were all children once and we have fallen in love with a girl for the first time, everything is wonderful until you are separated by distance.
